column9: a scaoileann; a scaoileas /a scaoileann*; a scaoileas*

column8: a scaoilfidh; a scaoilfeas /a scaoilfidh*; a scaoilfeas*

column1: scaoil amach ‎(“to let out; to release, loosen”)  scaoil anuas ‎(“to let down; to set down”)  scaoil as ‎(“to let out of; to fire from; to break loose from”)  scaoil chuig, scaoil chun ‎(“to let go to”)  scaoil de ‎(“to let go, release, undo”)  scaoil faoi ‎(“to set about”)
column3: scaoil i ‎(“to separate into”)  scaoil le ‎(“to free from restraint; to cast to; to let go with; to make over to; to fire at”)  scaoil ó ‎(“to release from; to let go from”)  scaoil thar ‎(“to let pass over”)  scaoil thart, scaoil timpeall ‎(“to pass round”)  urscaoil ‎(“to discharge”)
